column1:
If set to 'Yes' the BESUGRE Recommendation extension is enabled and generates product recommendations according to the below mentioned configuration options and the recommendation engine configuration in the BESUGRE Recommendation tool (menu Promotions / BESUGRE Recommendation).
If set to 'No' the extension is completely disabled.
column2:
If set to 'Yes' the BESUGRE Recommendation extension is enabled and generates product recommendations according to the below mentioned configuration options and the recommendation engine configuration in the BESUGRE Recommendation tool (menu Promotions / BESUGRE Recommendation).
If set to 'No' the extension is completely disabled.

column1: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on product list (=category) pages. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.
column2: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on product list (=category) pages. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.

column1: Optionally specify the title of the recommendation block, e.g. 'Customers who bought this also bought..'. If left empty the block shows no title above the recommended products.
column2: Optionally specify the title of the recommendation block, e.g. 'Customers who bought this also bought..'. If left empty the block shows no title above the recommended products.

column1: Specify the position of the recommendation block depending on the column and vertical alignment. Depending on your current Magento theme not all positions may be available.
column2: Specify the position of the recommendation block depending on the column and vertical alignment. Depending on your current Magento theme not all positions may be available.

column1:
How many items should be visible to the user in the recommendation block?
Please note that this setting should be chosen depending on the position on page. Usually for a position in the main column ca. 5 - 8 visible items are recommended. In contrast in the left or right column displaying only 1 item at a time might be more attractive.
column2:
How many items should be visible to the user in the recommendation block?
Please note that this setting should be chosen depending on the position on page. Usually for a position in the main column ca. 5 - 8 visible items are recommended. In contrast in the left or right column displaying only 1 item at a time might be more attractive.

column1: Specify the maximum number of recommended items that should be shown in total.
column2: Specify the maximum number of recommended items that should be shown in total.

column1: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on product detail pages. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.
column2: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on product detail pages. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.

column1: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on the shopping cart page. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.
column2: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on the shopping cart page. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.

column1: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on the order success page. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.
column2: If enabled product recommendations will be shown on the order success page. The configuration can be done by the below mentioned options.

column1: Configuration of the BESUGRE Recommendation widgets. If you need any assistance please do not hesitate to contact us.
column2: Configuration of the BESUGRE Recommendation widgets. If you need any assistance please do not hesitate to contact us.

column1:
We offer 3 different layout options by default:
Carousel allows you to slide through the different recommended products. A carousel with Shown item counts = 1 will only display 1 product at a time.
Carousel displaying a highlighted top item consists of 2 rows with a Carousel layout in the lower one and additionally highlights the first recommended product more prominently on the first row.
Simple list displays a list of recommended products analogous to the standard Magento product lists.
column2:
We offer 3 different layout options by default:
Carousel allows you to slide through the different recommended products. A carousel with Shown item counts = 1 will only display 1 product at a time.
Carousel displaying a highlighted top item consists of 2 rows with a Carousel layout in the lower one and additionally highlights the first recommended product more prominently on the first row.
Simple list displays a list of recommended products analogous to the standard Magento product lists.
